CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required ** The email address to send notifications to regarding the "Assigned To" record -- required if "Receives Email Notifications" is checked. Defaults to the related Contact's "Preferred Email".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required ** The email address to send notifications to regarding the "Assigned To" record -- required if "Receives Email Notifications" is checked. Defaults to the related Contact's "Preferred Email".
CustomField.label: Email
